transformations.name: CodeValues
transformations.description: Removing columns not used in mapping

transformations.name: CodeTypes
transformations.description: Remove columns not used in mapping

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		map_code_val_id as long,
		target_table_id as long,
		map_code_type_id as long,
		source_tab_col_id as long,
		source_code_action as string,
		active_flag as string,
		om_x_ref as string,
		source_code_field2 as string,
		source_code_field2_value as string,
		source_code_table as string,
		source_code_descr as string,
		map_rule as string,
		source_code_field3_value as string,
		created_by as string,
		gard_comments as string,
		target_short_descr as string,
		source_table2_id as long,
		intech_comments as string,
		source_code_field1 as string,
		predefined_om_code as string,
		source_code_field4 as string,
		target_long_descr as string,
		source_code_field1_value as string,
		code2 as string,
		target_code as string,
		source_code_field3 as string,
		modified_date as date,
		source_code_field4_value as string,
		modified_by as string,
		code2_description as string,
		source_system as string,
		source_code_key as string,
		created_date as date,
		source_table_id as long,
		map_code_status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OmMapCodeValues
source(output(
		map_code_type_id as long,
		map_code_type as string,
		target_table_id as long,
		map_code_type_parent as long,
		modified_date as date,
		used_in_dwh as string,
		codeset_category as string,
		map_code_type_descr as string,
		idx_max_length as long,
		om_index_code as string,
		to_load as string,
		functional as string,
		intech_notify as string,
		trial_version as long,
		target_table_name as string,
		dwh_notify as string,
		target_tab_col_id as long,
		comments as string,
		editable as string,
		target_column_name as string,
		codeset_type as string,
		modified_by as string,
		module as string,
		idx_min_length as long,
		parent_required as string,
		created_date as date,
		dummy_modified_by as string,
		created_by as string,
		fairplay_table as string,
		map_code_status as string,
		gard_resp as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OmMapCodeType
FilteredCodeValues select(mapColumn(
		code2_codeTypes = code2,
		map_code_type_id_codeValues = map_code_type_id,
		source_code_key_codeTypes = source_code_key,
		source_system_codeTypes = source_system,
		om_x_ref_codeTypes = om_x_ref,
		target_long_descr_codeTypes = target_long_descr,
		target_code_codeTypes = target_code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CodeValues
FilterCodeTypeID select(mapColumn(
		map_code_type_id_codeTypes = map_code_type_id,
		map_code_type_codeTypes = map_code_type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CodeTypes
CodeValues, CodeTypes join(map_code_type_id_codeValues == map_code_type_id_codeTypes,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinCodeTypeAndValues
JoinCodeTypeAndValues derive(source_code_key = case(source_system_codeTypes =='PARIS' && contains([122,173], 
#item == map_code_type_id_codeValues),source_code_key_codeTypes,source_code_key_codeTypes)) ~> DerivedSourceCodeKey
OmMapCodeType filter(contains([329, 106,122,113,50,45,124,367,219,374,151,167, 101, 100, 180, 108, 107,    
370,117,112,466, 136,179,404, 157, 148, 391,127,116, 464,384,161, 198 ,109,771,770,
774,775,773,772,776,777,127,169,170,460,785,787,788,791,786,792,794,123,793,795,797,
798,796,800,801,368,802,803,804,806,807,407,809,811,812,813,816,827,828], #item == map_code_type_id)) ~> FilterCodeTypeID
DerivedSourceCodeKey select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key,
		source_system = source_system_codeTypes,
		target_code = target_code_codeTypes,
		target_description = target_long_descr_codeTypes,
		code_type = map_code_type_codeTypes,
		code_type_id = map_code_type_id_codeValues,
		code2 = code2_codeTypes,
		om_x_ref = om_x_ref_codeTypes
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTcrossReference
SelectTcrossReference aggregate(groupBy(source_code_key,
		source_system,
		target_code,
		target_description,
		code_type_id,
		code2,
		om_x_ref),
	code_type = first(code_type)) ~> Deduplicate
OmMapCodeValues filter(!contains([source_code_field1,source_code_field2,source_code_field3,source_code_field4],#item=='created_by')) ~> FilteredCodeValues
Deduplicate sink(input(
		code_type_id as long,
		code2 as string,
		target_description as string,
		source_system as string,
		om_x_ref as string,
		target_code as string,
		code_type as string,
		source_code_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		code_type_id,
		code2,
		target_description,
		source_system,
		om_x_ref,
		target_code,
		code_type,
		source_code_key
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> tCrossReference
